front.title: CJK Terminology for Label Generation Rules

abstract.t: Chinese Generation Panel [CGP], Japanese Generation Panel [JGP], and Korean Generation Panel [KGP] are collaborating to develop Root zone LGR [RootLGR] for Chinese/Japanese/Korean (CJK). During the cross- communities collaboration work, CJK GPs, together with Integration Panel [IP] members, recognized that a common terminology definition for key concepts is essential in order to have an efficient, transparent and smooth progress of developing CJK Label Generation Rules (LGR) [I-D.ietf-lager-specification].
